name: Chef Mao
description: After playing a Food Event Card: Create 1 random Basic Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card:</color> Create 1 random Basic Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card:</color> Create 1 random Basic Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
storytext: "We just concern ourselves with making the most delicious food imaginable using everyday ingredients, universally loved flavors, and truly excellent cooking."
source: Reward for accepting Chef Mao's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
